content: instagram posts she is quite the author i recommend having a read through her entertaining and endearing writings from all this inspiration my shadetree team and i bring you five bright blankets and four free floral motifs made with scheepjes yarns i hope y all enjoy them the standard chunk of lorem ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested sections 1 10 32 s d r i b tiny garden collab a cypresstextiles tester tribe collaboration what a beautiful experience i feel more connected to my fellow crafters than ever with this lovely make first i sent my tester tribe friends a ball of scheepjes catona denim contributors selected any motifs from the tiny garden pattern worked them up and sent them all to me for joining receiving the little packages of colorful hexagons was the highlight of my day i used the continuous flat braid join for hexagons and my trusty treble scallop edging both available as free tutorials head to cypresstextiles net and click menu item shadetree for these resources flat braid join is very forgiving perfect for motifs with slightly varying gauges our collab blanket stands as a reminder of how awesome it is for crafting friends to connect the crafter community has a wealth of talent and a distinctive synergy when we continue to support each together tester tribe members amy mason andrea grimaldi-greig andrea vandenbroeke ariel jensen carol white janik gwen kok irene rijk iris dongo jennifer lamastra kaelyn guerin makenzie pearson robyn axelrod teresa daily davis tiffany santos wendy roodenburg-wischhoff
